data.lyric:
[ti:Cool Again]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:Cool Again]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Cool Again - Kane Brown
[00:04.04]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/Will Hoge/Matt McGinn/Lindsay Rimes
[00:08.08]Composed by：Kane Brown/Will Hoge/Matt McGinn/Lindsay Rimes
[00:12.12]I've been thinkin' 'bout ya lately
[00:14.70]Reminiscin' goin' crazy
[00:17.34]Miss the way your kiss would keep me up
[00:22.22]Ayy wish that you were here tonight
[00:24.60]Drinkin' vodka soda extra limes
[00:27.96]And we could just get back to bein' us
[00:31.91]'Cause I just wanna be cool again cool again cool again
[00:36.71]Like we were last summer
[00:38.09]Want you again you again you again
[00:42.03]To be stealin' my covers
[00:43.38]All tangled in each other nights still playin' back in my head
[00:48.02]I just wanna be cool again cool again cool again yeah
[01:00.00]Do you ever think about
[01:02.63]The days we couldn't live without each other
[01:05.85]Where the hell did we go wrong
[01:10.03]Ayy how'd we go from that to this
[01:13.31]How'd we let a good thing slip
[01:15.95]Do we really have to go move on
[01:20.15]I just wanna be cool again cool again cool again
[01:24.56]Like we were last summer
[01:26.07]Want you again you again you again
[01:29.84]To be stealin' my covers
[01:31.33]All tangled in each other nights still playin' back in my head
[01:35.94]I just wanna be cool again cool again cool again yeah
[01:46.62]Yeah I just wanna be cool again
[01:53.26]Cool again cool again cool again cool again
[01:58.00]'Cause I just wanna be cool again cool again cool again
[02:02.59]Like we were last summer
[02:03.98]Want you again you again you again
[02:07.96]To be stealin' my covers
[02:09.37]All tangled in each other nights still playin' back in my head
[02:13.95]I just wanna be cool again cool again cool again yeah
[02:22.47]Cool again cool again cool again
[02:23.43]Y'all know that I just wanna be cool again
[02:26.22]Cool again cool again cool again
[02:30.09]Last summer with you
[02:31.07]Cool again cool again cool again
[02:34.18]Cool again
[02:36.31]Cool again cool again
[02:38.33]Cool again yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Cool Again]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:Cool Again]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.04]//
[00:08.08]//
[00:12.12]最近 我一直在想你
[00:14.70]缅怀过去 快要疯掉
[00:17.34]想起那让我心醉的吻
[00:22.22]真希望今晚你在我身边
[00:24.60]喝着伏特加汽水 加点酸橙汁
[00:27.96]我们可以回到从前相知相守的时候
[00:31.91]因为我只想找回那种快乐
[00:36.71]就像我们去年夏天那样
[00:38.09]想要你回来
[00:42.03]和我抢被子
[00:43.38]与彼此交缠在一起 那些美好夜晚依然在我脑海里不断回放
[00:48.02]我只想找回当初的快乐
[01:00.00]你会不会想起
[01:02.63]我们曾经形影不离的日子
[01:05.85]我们之间到底出了什么问题
[01:10.03]我们怎么会变成这样
[01:13.31]我们怎么会让美好感情就这样溜走
[01:15.95]我们真的得放下过去了吗
[01:20.15]我只想找回当初的快乐
[01:24.56]就像我们去年夏天那样
[01:26.07]想要你回来
[01:29.84]和我抢被子
[01:31.33]与彼此交缠在一起 那些美好夜晚依然在我脑海里不断回放
[01:35.94]我只想找回当初的快乐
[01:46.62]我只想找回当初的快乐
[01:53.26]找回当初的快乐
[01:58.00]因为我只想找回那种快乐
[02:02.59]就像我们去年夏天那样
[02:03.98]想要你回来
[02:07.96]和我抢被子
[02:09.37]与彼此交缠在一起 那些美好夜晚依然在我脑海里不断回放
[02:13.95]我只想找回当初的快乐
[02:22.47]找回当初的快乐
[02:23.43]你知道 我只想找回当初的快乐
[02:26.22]找回当初的快乐
[02:30.09]去年夏天和你在一起的快乐
[02:31.07]找回当初的快乐
[02:34.18]找回那种快乐
[02:36.31]找回那种快乐
[02:38.33]找回那种快乐
